summary: This document is a chain of congratulatory emails from March 2022 regarding the upcoming Finest Foundation Awards ceremony on November 9, 2021. The emails recognize an NYPD detective and an FBI Special Agent for their work on the Epstein case, indicating they are part of the NYPD/FBI Child Exploitation and Human Trafficking Task Force.

persons.name: John F. Penn
persons.context: FBI Special Agent (NY) who is copied on an email congratulating investigators for their work on the Epstein case and their upcoming award.

events.title: Finest Foundation Awards Ceremony
events.description: An awards ceremony held at 1 PP Auditorium to recognize law enforcement personnel, including investigators who worked on the Epstein case.

keyFacts: An NYPD detective and an FBI Special Agent were selected to receive the Finest Foundation Award for their work on the Epstein case.
The recipients were part of the NYPD/FBI Child Exploitation and Human Trafficking Task Force.
The award ceremony was scheduled for November 9, 2021, at the 1 PP Auditorium.
The email chain shows internal recognition within law enforcement for the investigators' work on the Epstein investigation.
The document is dated March 2022, with the sender noting they were catching up on emails due to maternity leave.
